title: Up to 70% Off on Everything!**

narration:

title: Easy and Convenient Shopping**

content: -  Shop online or visit our stores.
narration:
Shopping for Diwali has never been easier!  You can shop online or visit our stores.  We offer fast and secure checkout, and free shipping on orders over [amount].

title: Happy Diwali!**
image_desc: A beautiful image of a lit diya with a warm glow, symbolizing happiness and prosperity.
content: -  Wishing you a joyous and prosperous Diwali!
May your celebrations be filled with light and happiness.
narration: Happy Diwali!  We wish you a joyous and prosperous Diwali filled with light, happiness, and love.  Don't forget to take advantage of our amazing Diwali sale!  Shop now and make your celebrations even brighter.
